title: Fredericksburg & Spotsylvania National Military Park: Multimedia Presentations
body: Multimedia Presentations          Community at War: Virtual Classroom Not sure when you'll be able to make it to the park for a field trip? Or just want your kids to dig deeper into the history of the Civil War? Check out our new virtual classroom, Community at War, which explores the stories of the people who experienced the Battle of Fredericksburg first hand through interactive and multimedia elements. Visit Community at War here.  Â    Park Videos Fredericksburg- and Chancellorsville Battle Apps Narrated by Current and Former NPS Historians for the Civil War Trust (Apps require an Apple iTunes account.)
